participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and stylish, he has a keen interest in luxury items and values personal expression through fashion.
participant_1.background: my family does not support my career choices. i like shopping. i often shop for shoes and watches. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i currently work for a watch dealer.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Relaxed and thoughtful, she enjoys quiet time and values her independence.
participant_2.background: i love taking bubble baths. i do not drink alcohol. i like to play chess. i'm single and with two dogs. i'm in my thirties.
